# ARES Repository

This repository contains the ARES (Autonomous Resilient Enterprise Suite) project.

- **Language**: Python
- **License**: Proprietary
- **Version**: 1.0.0

## Features

- GDPR-compliant AI Command Center
- 100% offline operation
- Hybrid RAG engine
- PII masking with Microsoft Presidio
- German language support
